import pandas as pd

df_dict = pd.read_excel('../input/military-equipment-for-local-law-enforcement/AllStatesAndTerritoriesQTR4FY21.xlsx', sheet_name=None)
df = pd.concat(df_dict, ignore_index=True)
df.to_csv('dod_all_states.csv', index=False)
df
